titles.title: Recognizing the anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Arbroath and supporting the establishment of a National Tartan Day to recognize the outstanding achievements and contributions made by Scottish Americans to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Civil Service and Agency Organization.

bill.summary: 3/29/2001--Introduced. Recognizes the historical significance of the anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Arbroath (the Scottish Declaration of Independence). Calls for the establishment of a National Tartan Day to recognize the outstanding achievements and contributions made by Scottish Americans to the United States.
